channel.title: Knn Algorithm on Institute of Infomation Systems at HU-Berlin

item.title: Causal KNN
item.description: LatexIT.add(‘p’,true); Applied Predictive Analytics Seminar - Causal KNN Beyond estimating the overall effect of a treatment, the uplift, econometric and statistical literature have set their eyes on estimating the personal treatment effect for each individual. This blogpost highly relates to the paper of Hitsch & Misra (2018), where a novel, direct uplift modeling approach is introduced, called Causal KNN. The k-nearest neighbour algorithm provides an interesting opportunity for the estimation of treatment effects in small groups.
